name: places/ChIJ8Y5CeJtZwokRQPwaWujLEBw
formattedAddress: 19 E 7th St, New York, NY 10003, USA
adrFormatAddress: 19 E 7th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Jillian has been coloring my hair for over a decade and is truly the most talented colorist I have ever worked with. I ALWAYS leave feeling beautiful and confident. She is a true artist and is so talented in her work. She is also the kindest human and we have the best conversations when I come in for my appointments. I cannot recommend her enough. If you are blonde and live in NYC Jillian is a staple and must see.

originalText.text: Molly, molly, molly, molly, molly, molly. That’s all I have to say. I’ve had the best few years in the life of my hairstyle since I’ve met her. I used to get my haircut by a super famous fancy hair stylist. I won’t need any names and honestly Molly came in and stole his crown.  She’s awesome human being and I really love this salon.

text.text: Molly, molly, molly, molly, molly, molly. That’s all I have to say. I’ve had the best few years in the life of my hairstyle since I’ve met her. originalText.text: Joey is a master of his craft - he explained everything so well and really thinks in "three dimensions" to create a cut that works properly with my thick hair texture. I'm so happy I came to Blackstones, Joey's cut is amazing, the salon is beautiful and the entire staff was lovely and welcoming.

text.text: Joey is a master of his craft - he explained everything so well and really thinks in "three dimensions" to create a cut that works properly with my thick hair texture. I'm so happy I came to Blackstones, Joey's cut is amazing, the salon is beautiful and the entire staff was lovely and welcoming.

originalText.text:
Emad is the best barber I have ever had. And I am 60 so I seen many lol. I have been going now for a few years, every 4 to 5 weeks and have never had a bad haircut, in fact they have all been outstanding. So good that people actually compliment me on my hair cut.  I have never had that happen before with all the other places I’ve gone to. His attention to detail is second to none and he is one of the nicest guys I know. The shop is very clean, modern looking and everyone there is friendly and happy, they are all willing and able to satisfy your
needs and it shows. I can’t say enough good things about this place, so do yourself a favor and go there and see for yourself. You WILL NOT be disappointed.

originalText.text: I have been going to Jillian for my color for going on 4 years now and she is truly the best blond balayage color specialist I have personally ever had.  I’d actually like to break this down into two sections as it rightfully deserves - skill set and customer service/relationship.  When it comes to Jillian’s skill set, she’s an incredibly talented and knowledgeable color specialist. She has a wealth of knowledge when it comes to blonde balayage and her repertoire of beyond satisfied customers shows that.  You can check her Instagram for all the beautiful and successful women she has styled. She’s incredibly experienced in the craft and also has a passion for coloring blonde, which makes her skill even stronger.  When it comes to customer relationship - Jillian is equal parts inviting, welcoming, communicative, and professional.  Every time I come to her for my hair we always have a conversation and touch base. It can always be nerve wrecking coming into a salon as hair is so personal however Jillian is a great listener and wants to make sure you get what you envisioned. I honestly refuse to see anyone else after going to Jillian as her skill set matched with her customer service skills is a combination that is hard to beat.
